resources.string: Here store models which you used recently
There are 5 main categories on the Main Screen:

After pressing the Start button choose the model from the suitable category, moving through the tabs. You can use the back button to go back. Once you have selected a model, you will automatically be taken to the placement screen
After clicking on the button, the file manager will open, from where you can select the desired file with the .glb extension
In the settings you can manage options such as changing the color theme of the application and changing the language

In the model placement window, point the camera at the desired location and press the CREATE button. The model will be fixed in this place. To return to the selection of models, click the back button on the navigation bar
